name: Greatnessguru.GitHub.io - Eddie Maddox
tagline: Greatness: Serve the Many - The Master Teacher
body:
### [Greatnessguru Wiki](https://github.com/Greatnessguru/Greatnessguru.github.io/wiki) - Nonprofits, Brainstorm attacks, whatever

### Greatnessguru Flea Market

#### Amazon Campus
1. [Greatnessguru Flea Market]
(http://astore.amazon.com/greatnessguru-20)
2. [Greatnessguru Flea Market, Amateur Radio]
(http://astore.amazon.com/greatnessguru-amateur_radio-20):
hobby for learning Technology skills
3. [Greatnessguru Flea Market, Handmade]
(http://astore.amazon.com/greatnessguru-handmade-20)
4. [Greatnessguru Flea Market, Handmade Artwork]
(http://astore.amazon.com/greatnessguru-handmade_artwork-20)
5. [Greatnessguru Flea Market, Handmade Bedding]
(http://astore.amazon.com/greatnessguru-handmade_bedding-20)
6. [Greatnessguru Flea Market, Handmade Furniture]

7. [Greatnessguru Flea Market, Handmade Home Décor]

8. [Greatnessguru Flea Market, Handmade Kitchen & Dining]

9. [Greatnessguru Flea Market, Handmade Stationery & Party Supplies]
(http://astore.amazon.com/greatnessguru-handmade_stationery_and_party_supplies-20)

#### Truehope Campus - A Canadian nonprofit
1. http://www.Truehope.com/ - Advanced Natural Medicine  
"Nutrient Theory of Mental Illness, Clinical Research,  
Information For Healthcare Professionals,  
Video and Written Testimonials."
2. http://www.Truehope.com/winning-court-case.html - 2006  
Health Canada v. Truehope Court Case - "... stop selling and distributing ..."  
"Fearing for the health, safety and well-being ... continued to take orders ...  
transmit the orders ..., and distribute ... in Canada." - 2003
3. http://www.Truehope.com/uploads/4/4/5/6/44562925/full_written_decision.pdf  
Full written decision - Honorable Judge G. M. Meagher, 2006  
- p.14-15, "[59] …the Defendants were under a duty or duties described in  
[Section] 216 and 217 of the Criminal Code of Canada  
to continue to provide the vitamin/mineral micronutrient treatment and  
to maintain the support program or possibly face the consequences of  
being charged with criminal negligence. ...  
Further, the Defendants argued that it was established law  
that it was no defence to charges of criminal negligence  
to say that one had to cause harm  
because one had to comply with licensing requirement."
- p.11, [43], "... As stated by the Supreme Court of Canada ...:  
"... a liberal and humane criminal law cannot  
hold people to the strict obedience of laws  
in emergency situations where normal human instincts, ...,  
overwhelmingly compel disobedience."

#### Oxyfresh Campus
1. http://Greatnessguru.LifeShotz.com/ - New program name: Life Matters  
"We didn't need to find a miracle berry in a rainforest.  
We just turned to research ...."
2. http://Oxyfresh.com/Greatnessguru/ - Parent company of Life Matters  
"Discover premium ... dental, pet,  
weight loss, and personal/home products  
... people around the world ... use, love and buy forever."

#### Wiens Ministries - Patti Wiens
1. http://WiensMinistries.org/ - Homeschool Bible books, other  
2. http://WiensMinistries.org/patti/patti-bio.html - Bio with video  
3. http://www.Legacy.com/guestbooks/startribune/richard-b-wiens-condolences/107104921  
Rev. Richard B. Wiens - "... went to be with the Lord on April 3, 2008."

### Greatness: Serve the Many - The Master Teacher
http://Greatnessguru.GitHub.io/ - Eddie Maddox, rural MI USA
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
